Package com.fssa.librarymanagement.exceptions

package com.fssa.librarymanagement.exceptions
This package contains user-defined exceptions that help the library system handle unexpected situations. It includes exceptions for problems related to services, data access, and validation.

Each exception in this package tells the program when something unexpected happens. For example, if a service can't work properly, a Service Exception can be called to let the program know about it.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.fssa.librarymanagement
    This package is like the main control room of the Library Management System.
  • Exceptions
    Class
    Description
    DAOException
    This exception class is used to handle errors related to Data Access Object (DAO) operations.
    ServiceException
    This exception class is used to handle errors related to service layer operations.
    ValidationException
    This exception class is used to handle validation errors related to validation layer operations.
